local_intent: Detect the cloth, approach and align to it with 0.01 tolerance, then verify arrival.
assumptions: Tool yaw is already set upstream (SetTCPYaw=90 in GLOBAL_BT).
Cloth is within the camera workspace as per preconditions.
coherence_with_global: Keeps the approach phase: DetectObject(800) -> IsObjectVisible -> ApproachAndAlign(target=cloth, tolerance=0.01, timeout_ms=1200) -> IsAt for verification, matching the GLOBAL_BT ordering before contact and push.
